member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.OpenApiExtensionDataAttribute
member.summary: Indicates extension data to be added to the Swagger definition.
member.remarks: Requires the SwaggerExtensionDataOperationProcessor to be used in the Swagger definition generation.

member.name: M:NSwag.Annotations.OpenApiExtensionDataAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The key.
The value.

member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerExtensionDataAttribute
member.summary: Indicates extension data to be added to the Swagger definition.
member.remarks: Requires the SwaggerExtensionDataOperationProcessor to be used in the Swagger definition generation.

member.name: M:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerExtensionDataAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The key.
The value.

member.name: P:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerExtensionDataAttribute.Key
member.summary: Gets the key.

member.name: P:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerExtensionDataAttribute.Value
member.summary: Gets the value.

member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.ResponseTypeAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the result type of a HTTP operation to correctly generate a Swagger definition.
member.remarks: Use , this attribute will be obsolete soon.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerDefaultResponseAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that a default response (HTTP 200/204) should be generated from the return type of the operation method (not needed if no response type attributes are available).
member.remarks: Use ASP.NET Core native attributes (ProducesDefaultResponseType) instead of this attribute.

member.name: M:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerDefaultResponseAttribute.#ctor
member.remarks: Use ASP.NET Core native attributes (ProducesResponseType) instead of this attribute.

member.name: P:NSwag.Annotations.SwaggerResponseAttribute.IsNullable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the response can be null; the property is ignored if the specified type is not nullable (default: true).
